Detailed Description

MultiStringSearch including functions for searching.

(To avoid cluttering the Modules/ with too many files). All member data must be possible to save into a DataBuffer so if you need to add something you must add it to the MultiStringSearch and WriteableMultiStringSearch.

template<class ADDER>
int SearchableMultiStringSearch::internalSearch (  ADDER &  adder,
const SearchQuery &  query,
const char *  str
)  const [private]
 

Internal function for searching ADDER.addResult will be called everytime something should be added.

This is so that the same foundation of search functionality can be used both in ordinary search and allWords.
